definition: the act of sailing close to the wind, flap when the wind is blowing equally on both sides
details:
noun
- the act of sailing close to the wind
- (nautical) the forward edge of a fore-and-aft sail that is next to the mast
verb
- flap when the wind is blowing equally on both sides
= example: flap when the wind is blowing equally on both sides
- sail close to the wind
= synonyms: point
